question: could you plz tell me a dua to help me through my exams as this is my final year in school. jazakallah
answer:
QUESTION

could you plz tell me a dua to help me through my exams as this is my final year in school. jazakallah

ANSWER


Share:

Indeed dua is effective but together with that you will have to work hard to pass the exam. Learn your work and be mentally prepared to write the exam. You may recite "Rabby Yassir wala tuaâ€™ssir watamimhu bilk hair".

And Allah Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
